author: Misty Copeland
body: Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.

author: Anonymous
body: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.

author: Frances Wright
body: Equality is the soul of liberty; there is, in fact, no liberty without it.

author: Abraham Lincoln
body: These men ask for just the same thing: fairness, and fairness only. This is, so far as in my power, they, and all others, shall have.
